data: {"concept_id": "verb", "concept_name": "Verb", "set": "Grammar & Punctuation", "type": "element", "definition": "The sentence engine controlling action/state, time, aspect, voice, modality, negation, and intensity to steer pace and tone.", "axes": "action_vs_state|tense|aspect|voice|modality|negation|intensity", "axis_values": "action|state_linking | past|present|future|past_perfect|present_perfect|future_perfect | simple|progressive|perfect|habitual | active|passive | none|can_could|may_might|must_should|will_would | affirmative|negated | neutral|soft|strong", "source_file": "Verb.md", "source_md5": "e9a5096604c5e8820d79435970a55180", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T21:07:03.341630Z"}
